history.proof: intros. apply is_lim_unique. srun best use: is_lim_continuity.

exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R x : R H : continuity_pt f x P : R -> Prop Unable to unify "match Lim ?M2367 ?M2368 with | Finite a => locally a P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball (f x) eps y -> P y".

In environment f : R -> R x : R H : continuity_pt f x Unable to unify "(ex_finite_lim ?M2367 ?M2368 -> ex_lim ?M2367 ?M2368 /\\ is_finite (Lim ?M2367 ?M2368)) /\\ (ex_lim ?M2367 ?M2368 /\\ is_finite (Lim ?M2367 ?M2368) -> ex_finite_lim ?M2367 ?M2368)" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally (f x) P -> filtermap f (Rbar_locally' x) P".

original: intros f x cont_f_x. apply is_lim_unique. apply Lim_correct. apply ex_finite_lim_correct. apply cont_f_x. apply cont_f_x.
